data.title: Recipients of the Honorary Freedom of the City of Liverpool
data.meta_description: 7th July 1886 Lieut. General Sir Andrew Clarke GCMG CB CIE 9th November 1889 Sir Andrew Barclay Walker Bt DL 7th January 1891 William Cliff Esq. JP 3rd June 1891 William Rathbone Esq. MP JP DL 3rd June 1891 Henry … Read more…
